name: Wrist Curl
how_to: Sit on a bench with your forearms resting on your thighs, hold a barbell or dumbbells with an underhand grip, curl your wrists upward, and lower them back down.

name: Reverse Wrist Curl
how_to: Sit on a bench with your forearms resting on your thighs, hold a barbell or dumbbells with an overhand grip, curl your wrists upward, and lower them back down.

name: Hammer Curl
how_to: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, hold a dumbbell in each hand with a neutral grip (palms facing each other), curl the dumbbells up to shoulder level, and lower them back down.

name: Reverse Curl
how_to: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, hold a barbell or EZ curl bar with an overhand grip, curl the bar up to shoulder level, and lower it back down.

name: Zottman Curl
how_to: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, hold a dumbbell in each hand with an underhand grip, curl the dumbbells up, rotate your wrists to an overhand grip, and lower them back down.

name: Farmer's Walk
how_to: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, hold a heavy dumbbell or kettlebell in each hand at your sides, walk a certain distance or for a set time, and maintain an upright posture.

name: Towel Pull-Up
how_to: Hang a towel over a pull-up bar, grip the ends of the towel, pull your body up until your chin is above your hands, and lower back down.

name: Plate Pinch
how_to: Hold two weight plates together with smooth sides facing out, pinch them between your fingers and thumb, hold for a set time, and then release.

name: Wrist Roller
how_to: Hold a wrist roller with both hands, roll the weight up by twisting the roller, and then slowly lower it back down.

name: Behind-the-Back Wrist Curl
how_to: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, hold a barbell behind your back with an underhand grip, curl your wrists upward, and lower them back down.
